txt.en: 'Where is it that you come from?'
Register your heritage with the notary.

'Ah... from the Grey Mountains.\n\n'You are from Ered Mithrin, the Grey Mountains, the chief of which is Mount Gundabad, from whence came Durin the Deathless, first Father of the Dwarves. Your kindred returned to the Mountains after the Dragons perished.'
Speak with Wárr Ink-sleeve, the dwarf notary
Wárr Ink-sleeve can be found in the Great Hall of Thorin's Hall.
